name: Axiom Seymour Oceanweave P22 Panniers
description:
Pack all you need for your commute and help reduce waste in our waterways. The Seymour Oceanweave panniers' spacious compartments have plenty of room for your groceries, or work and school needs, and the waterproof fabric is dependable when the rain starts falling. Easy on-off hardware are a breeze when coming and going.Oceanweave® fabric is made with reclaimed fishnets.Water-resistant stiching and a polyurethane coating keep contents dry.Internal backboard keeps the pannier's shape.Rixen & Kaul® attachment system fits rails 6 to 16mm.Zippered rear pocket provides quick access to essentials.Reflective accents and light loops on both sides enhance visibility.

        Sustainability
